title: Niss
subtitle: Gnome Sorcerer
description:
"I can walk on my own... but I would not pass on a ride."

May assist you on an Attack Roll by adding 1d4 to that roll.

title: Selina
subtitle: Human Guardian
description:
"I can walk on my own... but I would not pass on a ride."

May bolster your Armor Class against an attack by adding 1d6 to that roll.

title: mysterious priest
subtitle: Antagonist
description: Be it an innate and cruel proficiency, the results of a pact with a rotten entity or a plane traveling daemon, this mysterious priest appears as a humble old man. But beneath that mask lingers a dark and sadistic mind.

title: Stoic Advance
subtitle: Salamanders - Chapter Tactic
description: Your sensors spotted a weak part of the enemies defence. Now is the time to strike
